description: This file defines functions for constructing and executing a processing pipeline for video analysis, involving stages like frame extraction, object detection, pose estimation, behavior analysis, and event determination. It provides interfaces to build default pipelines and run them on video frames.

methods.name: Tuple[Pipeline,PipelineContext] build_default_pipeline( video_source_path: Optional[str] = None, read_with_opencv: bool = False, extra_config: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
methods.description: Constructs a default video processing pipeline with stages for frame extraction, detection, pose estimation, behavior analysis, and event detection, returning the pipeline and its context.

methods.name: Iterable[Dict[str,Any]] run_on_frames( frames: Iterable[Tuple[Any, Optional[int], Optional[float]]], pipeline: Pipeline, )
methods.description: Executes the pipeline on an iterable of frames, yielding output items produced by the pipeline stages.

ctags.name: build_default_pipeline
ctags.signature: ( video_source_path: Optional[str] = None, read_with_opencv: bool = False, extra_config: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )

ctags.name: run_on_frames
ctags.signature: ( frames: Iterable[Tuple[Any, Optional[int], Optional[float]]], pipeline: Pipeline, )
